questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A flower illustration on a stone structure
D) Wildlife and animals

A) A person
B) A flower illustration on a stone structure
C) An animal
D) A building

A) A tree
B) A flower illustration on a stone structure
C) A person
D) A bench

A) A busy street
B) A lake and trees
C) A building
D) A playground

A) A flower bed
B) A stone structure with a flower illustration
C) A person sitting on a bench
D) A car

A) Rose
B) Southern Magnolia
C) Tulip
D) Sunflower

A) Red

A) Two
